name: Red and the Whispering Woods
description:
Red and the Whispering Woods is a reimagining of the classic Little Red Riding Hood tale. The game attempts to subvert some of the damsel-in distress tropes of the traditional story and reflect on a darker truth. In this game, Little Red has agency while she faces a threat that’s closer to home than the original. It’s a spooky journey into the woods and I hope you enjoy the game. 

=====
